comprehensive_overview: ruamel.yaml is a YAML 1.2 loader/dumper package for Python. It is a superset of the PyYAML library and it includes round-trip parsing (which allows for preserving comments and formatting when loading and then emitting the YAML data).
core_features: 1. Supports YAML 1.2 2. Round-trip parsing to preserve comments and formatting 3. Compatibility with PyYAML 4. Comprehensive documentation
